bugPattern.name: Non-conforming Cookie
bugPattern.description: The first two ClientHello messages use different cipher suites, indicating that cipher suites are not included in the cookie computation.

bugPattern.name: ChangeCipherSpec before CertificateVerify
bugPattern.description: A server, which is configured to require a valid certificate from the client, completes a handshake or re-handshake wherein a ChangeCipherSpec from the client is consumed by the server before a CertificateVerify.

bugPattern.name: Continue After Closure Alert
bugPattern.description: A server does not close down the connection on receiving or sending a close_notify alert.

bugPattern.name: Continue After Fatal Error Alert
bugPattern.description: A server does not terminate the connection on receiving a fatal error alert.

bugPattern.name: Finished Before ChangeCipherSpec
bugPattern.description: A server, which is configured to echo application data, completes a handshake or re-handshake wherein Finished is received before ChangeCipherSpec from the client

bugPattern.name: HelloVerifyRequest Retransmission
bugPattern.description: A server sends more than one HelloVerifyRequest, one after the other.

bugPattern.name: Internal Error on Finished
bugPattern.description: Sending an out-of-order client Finished causes an Internal Error alert.

bugPattern.name: Invalid DecryptError Alert
bugPattern.description: A server responds with DecryptError to plaintext messages.

bugPattern.name: Invalid Finished as Retransmission
bugPattern.description: A server, which is configured to require a valid certificate from the client, completes a handshake or re-handshake during which it receives multiple Certificate messages.

bugPattern.name: Invalid HelloVerifyRequest
bugPattern.description: A server treats a second Finished as a retransmission, and then retransmits the last flight.

bugPattern.name: Multiple Certificate
bugPattern.description: A server, which is configured to require a valid certificate from the client, completes a handshake or re-handshake during which it receives multiple Certificate messages.

bugPattern.name: Multiple ChangeCipherSpec
bugPattern.description: A server completes a hand- shake or re-handshake during which it receives multiple ChangeCipherSpec messages from the client.
